com.gdx.game.controller.entities

Class EntityController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gdx.game.controller.entities.EntityController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BallController, BonusController, PlainController

    public abstract class EntityController
extends java.lang.Object
    This Abstract class is used as base for all classes that have a virtual world placement, controlling mostly positioning.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EntityController()
      Creates a EntityController with no specified model or view.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dispose()
      Disposes of this Entity.

      Gets this entity view rigidBody.

      Gets this model color.
      EntityModel getModel()
      Gets this entity model.
      EntityView getView()
      Gets this entity view.
      void getWorldTransform()
      Calls bullet's getWorldTransform function For kinematic bodies this method is called to inform about the position every update For dynamic bodies this method is called once to get the initial state
      void moveToPos(float posX, float posY, float posZ)
      Translates this entity to a new position

      Sets this model current color.

      Sets this EntityController model.

      Sets this entity into a new position
      void setView(EntityView view)
      Sets this EntityController view.
      void setWorldTransform()
      Calls bullet's setWorldTransform function For dynamic bodies this method is called to inform about the body's position every update
      void updateModel()
      Updates this model coordinates accordingly to this view rigidBody positioning.

      • getWorldTransform

        public void getWorldTransform()
        Calls bullet's getWorldTransform function For kinematic bodies this method is called to inform about the position every update For dynamic bodies this method is called once to get the initial state

        public void setWorldTransform()
        Calls bullet's setWorldTransform function For dynamic bodies this method is called to inform about the body's position every update
